dict.string: cloudCover: A numerical value between 0 and 1 (inclusive) representing the percentage of sky occluded by clouds. A value of 0 corresponds to clear sky, 0.4 to scattered clouds, 0.75 to broken cloud cover, and 1 to completely overcast skies.
It will be clear skies - bring your sunglasses.
It's sweltering - stay cool with some shorts.
It's going to get chilly, bring a light jacket.
It's going to be cold! Bring a jacket.
Brr - it's going to be freezing. Bring a coat and gloves.
It's going to snow! Make sure you're protected.
There will be sleet. Bring a thick jacket.
Oh no - it's going to hail.
Bring an umbrella! It's going to rain.
